rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if an artifact you control entered this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
When this creature dies, target player may have it deal damage equal to its power to them. If they don't, you draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]“My domain is that of loss. It exists in the air, the ground, the water that flows.”[/i]
